Get Free Consultation

Sydney's Local Small Business Marketing Expert Fresh Approach, Proven Methods

Dominate Google searches in Bondi , Parramatta & Penrith across Greater Sydney. Founded 2024, I'm helping Sydney businesses get 2x more leads in 60 days with cutting-edge strategies.

🚀 Early Success Stories

See what our early clients are already achieving with our fresh approach to digital marketing.

🎯 Our Services

Everything You Need to Dominate Sydney

We don't just offer services—we deliver complete digital dominance. Our integrated approach ensures every dollar spent drives measurable growth.

Local SEO & Search Domination

Own page 1 of Google for your most profitable keywords. We don't just get you ranked—we get you the customers that matter.

  • Google My Business optimization
  • Local citation building
  • Review management system
  • Technical SEO audits
  • Content marketing strategy
  • Competitor analysis
Learn More

Google & Meta Ads Management

Get instant customers while your SEO builds momentum. Our certified experts maximize every ad dollar for maximum ROI.

  • Search & display campaigns
  • Facebook & Instagram ads
  • Landing page optimization
  • Conversion tracking setup
  • Advanced audience targeting
  • A/B testing & optimization
Learn More

High-Converting Web Design

Your website should be a 24/7 sales machine. We design conversion-focused sites that turn visitors into paying customers.

  • Mobile-first responsive design
  • Speed & performance optimization
  • Conversion rate optimization
  • User experience design
  • E-commerce development
  • Ongoing maintenance & support
Learn More
⚡ Our Process

From Struggling to Dominating in 90 Days

Our proven 4-step system is helping Sydney businesses transform from invisible to industry leaders. Here's exactly how we do it.

1

Deep-Dive Analysis

We audit your current digital presence, analyze your competitors, and identify the exact opportunities that will drive the biggest impact for your business. No guesswork—just data-driven insights.

2

Strategic Planning

Based on our analysis, we create a customized growth strategy that targets your ideal customers, maximizes your budget, and delivers measurable results within 90 days.

3

Rapid Implementation

We execute your strategy with precision and speed. From website optimization to ad campaigns, everything is implemented according to our proven framework for maximum impact.

4

Optimize & Scale

We continuously monitor, test, and optimize your campaigns to ensure peak performance. As results improve, we scale successful strategies to drive even greater growth.

💰 Simple Pricing

Choose Your Growth Level

No hidden fees, no lock-in contracts, no surprises. Just transparent pricing that scales with your success.

Monthly
Annual (Save 20%)

Starter Growth

Perfect for small businesses ready to establish their online presence

$990 /month
  • Local SEO optimization
  • Google My Business management
  • Basic website audit & fixes
  • Monthly progress reports
  • Email & phone support
  • No lock-in contracts
Get Started
Most Popular

Professional Growth

Comprehensive digital marketing for businesses serious about growth

$1,990 /month
  • Everything in Starter Growth
  • Google & Meta Ads management
  • Advanced SEO & content marketing
  • Conversion rate optimization
  • Weekly strategy calls
  • Priority support & dedicated account manager
  • Performance guarantee
Get Started

Enterprise Domination

Complete market domination for established businesses

$3,990 /month
  • Everything in Professional Growth
  • Full website redesign & optimization
  • Advanced analytics & attribution
  • Multi-location SEO management
  • Dedicated marketing team
  • Custom integrations & automation
  • Quarterly business reviews
Get Started

*Custom enterprise solutions available

❓ FAQs

Everything You Need to Know

Get answers to common questions about our services, process, and how we help Sydney businesses succeed.

6 questions

Our pricing is transparent and straightforward with no hidden fees. We offer three tiers: Starter Growth ($990/month), Professional Growth ($1,990/month), and Enterprise Domination ($3,990/month). Each package is designed for different business sizes and growth goals.

We service all of Greater Sydney including CBD, Eastern Suburbs, North Shore, Inner West, Western Sydney, and Southern Sydney. We work both remotely and in-person depending on your needs.

Most clients see initial improvements within 30 days, with significant results by 60-90 days. SEO typically takes 3-6 months for full impact, while Google Ads can generate leads within days.

While results vary by industry and competition, our clients typically see 2-3x increase in leads, 50-200% improvement in Google rankings, and 15-25% reduction in cost per acquisition within the first 6 months.

No! We believe in earning your business every month. All our services are month-to-month with no lock-in contracts. You can cancel or change your plan at any time with 30 days notice.

Not necessarily. We'll audit your current website first. If it's fundamentally sound, we'll optimize it. If it needs major work, we can redesign it as part of our Professional or Enterprise packages.

Ready to Dominate Your Market?

Join Sydney Businesses Getting Real Results

Stop losing customers to competitors. Start your journey to digital dominance today with a free strategy consultation.

✅ No lock-in contracts✅ 100% transparent reporting✅ Proven results in 30 days✅ Local Sydney team
Get Your Free $997 Strategy Session → Or Call Now: 0487 286 451

Only accepting 5 new clients this month

Let's Start Your Growth Journey

Get your free consultation and custom growth strategy within 24 hours

Your information is 100% secure and will never be shared

Get in Touch

Call Avi Directly: 0487 286 451
Email Us: avi@theprofitplatform.com.au
Service Area: Sydney, NSW
Business Hours: Mon-Fri 9am-6pm, Sat 10am-2pm
Average Response Time: 15 minutes during business hours

What Happens Next?

  • Quick 15-minute discovery call
  • Free audit of your current marketing
  • Custom growth strategy proposal
  • No obligation to proceed

The Profit Platform

We help Sydney businesses dominate Google and get more customers through proven digital marketing strategies. No lock-ins, just results.

0487 286 451
avi@theprofitplatform.com.au
Sydney, NSW, Australia

<script type="application/ld+json">
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "FAQPage",
  "mainEntity": [
    {
      "@type": "Question",
      "name": "How much does SEO cost in Sydney?",
      "acceptedAnswer": {
        "@type": "Answer",
        "text": "Our SEO services start from $2,500/month, with packages tailored to your business needs and goals."
      }
    },
    {
      "@type": "Question",
      "name": "How long does it take to see SEO results?",
      "acceptedAnswer": {
        "@type": "Answer",
        "text": "Most clients see significant improvements within 3-6 months, with continued growth over 12+ months."
      }
    },
    {
      "@type": "Question",
      "name": "Do you offer Google Ads management?",
      "acceptedAnswer": {
        "@type": "Answer",
        "text": "Yes, we provide comprehensive Google Ads management starting from $1,500/month plus ad spend."
      }
    },
    {
      "@type": "Question",
      "name": "What areas in Sydney do you service?",
      "acceptedAnswer": {
        "@type": "Answer",
        "text": "We service all of Sydney including CBD, North Shore, Eastern Suburbs, and Western Sydney."
      }
    }
  ]
}
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/fix-animations.css">
</script>

<script>
// Navigation functionality will be loaded from external JS file
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Import navigation functionality
    const script = document.createElement('script');
    script.src = '/js/components/navigation-inline.js';
    script.defer = true;
    document.head.appendChild(script);
});
</script>

bodyScripts.content:
console.log("🧪 TPP Inline Performance Monitor Loading...");class n{constructor(){this.metrics={},this.init()}init(){console.log("📊 Simple Performance Monitor starting..."),this.collectLCP(),this.collectFID(),this.collectCLS(),document.addEventListener("keydown",e=>{e.ctrlKey&&e.shiftKey&&e.key==="P"&&this.showDashboard()}),setTimeout(()=>{console.log("✅ Simple Performance Monitor ready!"),console.log("📈 Current metrics:",this.metrics),console.log("🔍 Press Ctrl+Shift+P to view dashboard")},1e3)}collectLCP(){"PerformanceObserver"in window&&new PerformanceObserver(t=>{for(const o of t.getEntries())this.metrics.lcp=Math.round(o.startTime),console.log("📏 LCP:",this.metrics.lcp+"ms")}).observe({entryTypes:["largest-contentful-paint"]})}collectFID(){"PerformanceObserver"in window&&new PerformanceObserver(t=>{for(const o of t.getEntries())this.metrics.fid=Math.round(o.processingStart-o.startTime),console.log("⚡ FID:",this.metrics.fid+"ms")}).observe({entryTypes:["first-input"]})}collectCLS(){if("PerformanceObserver"in window){let e=0;new PerformanceObserver(o=>{for(const r of o.getEntries())r.hadRecentInput||(e+=r.value);this.metrics.cls=Math.round(e*1e3)/1e3,console.log("🔄 CLS:",this.metrics.cls)}).observe({entryTypes:["layout-shift"]})}}showDashboard(){const e=`📊 TPP PERFORMANCE DASHBOARD
============================
🎯 LCP: ${this.metrics.lcp||"measuring..."}ms (Target: <2500ms)
⚡ FID: ${this.metrics.fid||"waiting for interaction..."}ms (Target: <100ms)
🔄 CLS: ${this.metrics.cls||"measuring..."} (Target: <0.1)

🖼️ Images: ${document.images.length} total
📊 Page Load: ${Math.round(Date.now()-performance.timeOrigin)}ms
💾 Memory: ${navigator.deviceMemory||"unknown"}GB
🌐 Connection: ${navigator.connection?.effectiveType||"unknown"}`;alert(e),console.log(e)}}document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){console.log("🚀 Initializing TPP Performance Monitor..."),window.tppPerformanceMonitor=new n});
bodyScripts.html:
<script type="module">console.log("🧪 TPP Inline Performance Monitor Loading...");class n{constructor(){this.metrics={},this.init()}init(){console.log("📊 Simple Performance Monitor starting..."),this.collectLCP(),this.collectFID(),this.collectCLS(),document.addEventListener("keydown",e=>{e.ctrlKey&&e.shiftKey&&e.key==="P"&&this.showDashboard()}),setTimeout(()=>{console.log("✅ Simple Performance Monitor ready!"),console.log("📈 Current metrics:",this.metrics),console.log("🔍 Press Ctrl+Shift+P to view dashboard")},1e3)}collectLCP(){"PerformanceObserver"in window&&new PerformanceObserver(t=>{for(const o of t.getEntries())this.metrics.lcp=Math.round(o.startTime),console.log("📏 LCP:",this.metrics.lcp+"ms")}).observe({entryTypes:["largest-contentful-paint"]})}collectFID(){"PerformanceObserver"in window&&new PerformanceObserver(t=>{for(const o of t.getEntries())this.metrics.fid=Math.round(o.processingStart-o.startTime),console.log("⚡ FID:",this.metrics.fid+"ms")}).observe({entryTypes:["first-input"]})}collectCLS(){if("PerformanceObserver"in window){let e=0;new PerformanceObserver(o=>{for(const r of o.getEntries())r.hadRecentInput||(e+=r.value);this.metrics.cls=Math.round(e*1e3)/1e3,console.log("🔄 CLS:",this.metrics.cls)}).observe({entryTypes:["layout-shift"]})}}showDashboard(){const e=`📊 TPP PERFORMANCE DASHBOARD
============================
🎯 LCP: ${this.metrics.lcp||"measuring..."}ms (Target: <2500ms)
⚡ FID: ${this.metrics.fid||"waiting for interaction..."}ms (Target: <100ms)
🔄 CLS: ${this.metrics.cls||"measuring..."} (Target: <0.1)

🖼️ Images: ${document.images.length} total
📊 Page Load: ${Math.round(Date.now()-performance.timeOrigin)}ms
💾 Memory: ${navigator.deviceMemory||"unknown"}GB
🌐 Connection: ${navigator.connection?.effectiveType||"unknown"}`;alert(e),console.log(e)}}document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){console.log("🚀 Initializing TPP Performance Monitor..."),window.tppPerformanceMonitor=new n});</script>
